result.eng: You will have to deal with the question.
result.ga: Beidh ort déileáil leis an cheist
result.orig: Beidh ort déileáil leis an cheist
result.html: Beidh ort déileáil leis an cheistYou will have to deal with the question.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ ort déileáil leis an ċeistYou will have to deal with the question.

result.eng: I need to look into the question.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé an cheist a fhiosrú
result.orig: Caithfidh mé an cheist a fhiosrú
result.html: Caithfidh mé an cheist a fhiosrúI need to look into the question.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé an ċeist a ḟiosrúI need to look into the question.

result.eng: They asked me the same question again and again.
result.ga: Chuir siad an cheist chéanna orm arís agus arís
result.orig: Chuir siad an cheist chéanna orm arís agus arís
result.html: Chuir siad an cheist chéanna orm arís agus arísThey asked me the same question again and again.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad an ċeist ċéanna orm arís agus arísThey asked me the same question again and again.

result.eng: She asked the priest's advice on the matter.
result.ga: Chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairt
result.orig: Chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairt
result.html: Chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairtShe asked the priest's advice on the matter.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sí an ċeist i gcoṁairle an tsagairtShe asked the priest's advice on the matter.

result.eng: I haven't gotten an answer to my question yet.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé freagra ar mo cheist go fóill
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé freagra ar mo cheist go fóill
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé freagra ar mo cheist go fóillI haven't gotten an answer to my question yet.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé freagra ar mo ċeist go fóillI haven't gotten an answer to my question yet.

result.eng: The matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.
result.ga: Pléadh an cheist ag cruinniú na comhairle
result.orig: Pléadh an cheist ag cruinniú na comhairle
result.html: Pléadh an cheist ag cruinniú na comhairleThe matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.
result.ponchtml: Pléaḋ an ċeist ag cruinniú na coṁairleThe matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.

result.html: Tá an cheist deacairThe question is hard.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċeist deacairThe question is hard.

result.eng: The question is much clearer now.
result.ga: Tá an cheist i bhfad níos soiléire anois
result.orig: Tá an cheist i bhfad níos soiléire anois
result.html: Tá an cheist i bhfad níos soiléire anoisThe question is much clearer now.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċeist i ḃfad níos soiléire anoisThe question is much clearer now.

result.eng: I need more time to examine the question properly.
result.ga: Tá níos mó ama uaim chun an cheist a chíoradh i gceart
result.orig: Tá níos mó ama uaim chun an cheist a chíoradh i gceart
result.html: Tá níos mó ama uaim chun an cheist a chíoradh i gceartI need more time to examine the question properly.
result.ponchtml: Tá níos mó ama uaim ċun an ċeist a ċíoraḋ i gceartI need more time to examine the question properly.

result.eng: It was foolish of me to ask that question.
result.ga: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a chur
result.orig: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a chur
result.html: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a churIt was foolish of me to ask that question.
result.ponchtml: B'amaideaċ an ṁaise domsa an ċeist a ċurIt was foolish of me to ask that question.

result.eng: The reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.
result.ga: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsanta
result.orig: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsanta
result.html: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsantaThe reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.
result.ponchtml: Is é fáṫ mo ẛuime sa ċeist seo ṫar ċeisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsantaThe reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.

result.eng: The question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?
result.ga: An cheist is mó atá ag déanamh scime do sheirbhísí rúnda Mheiriceá ná cá bhfuil na spiairí Rúiseacha
result.orig: An cheist is mó atá ag déanamh scime do sheirbhísí rúnda Mheiriceá ná cá bhfuil na spiairí Rúiseacha
result.html: An cheist is mó atá ag déanamh scime do sheirbhísí rúnda Mheiriceá ná cá bhfuil na spiairí RúiseachaThe question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?
result.ponchtml: An ċeist is mó atá ag déanaṁ scime do ẛeirḃísí rúnda Ṁeiriceá ná cá ḃfuil na spiairí RúiseaċaThe question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?

result.html: Eascraíonn an cheistThis raises a question:...
result.ponchtml: Eascraíonn an ċeistThis raises a question:...

result.eng: Although slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ga: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.orig: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.html: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ponchtml: Cé nárḃ é an scláḃaíoċt an t-aon ċúis le cogaḋ caṫarṫa na Stát Aontaiṫe ba ċeist lárnaċ íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
